name: representer
description: Represent, interact with, and serve AI-generated web documents for reports, UI or otherwise in Go

scripts.build: tailwindcss build -o static/css/tailwind.css && npx postcss static/css/tailwind.css -o static/css/tailwind.min.css
scripts.watch: tailwindcss -o static/css/tailwind.css --watch & npx postcss static/css/tailwind.css -o static/css/tailwind.min.css --watch
